hero.subtitle: The all-in-one digital platform to manage your menu, inventory, staff, and orders seamlessly. Boost efficiency, increase revenue, and delight your customers.

whatIsRMS.title: What is "Aap Ka Parcha" RMS?
whatIsRMS.description: The Restaurant Management System (RMS) is a comprehensive digital platform designed to revolutionize how restaurants, cafes, bars, hotels, and other service businesses manage their operations. It transforms traditional paper-based ordering into a seamless digital experience that benefits both customers and business owners.

homeSolutions.title: Tailored for Your Business
homeSolutions.subtitle: No matter your size or specialty, Aap Ka Parcha has a solution designed to meet your unique needs.

items.title: Restaurants
items.description: Streamline orders, manage tables, and optimize kitchen workflow for any dining experience.

items.title: Cafes
items.description: Handle peak hours with fast ordering, simple inventory, and customer loyalty tools.

items.title: Bars & Pubs
items.description: Gain precise control over beverage inventory, cocktail recipes, and quick billing.

items.title: Hotels
items.description: Integrate all your F&B outlets, from in-room dining to your restaurant, on one platform.

owners.title: For Business Owners & Managers
owners.subtitle: A complete suite of tools to empower your business and delight your patrons.

features.title: Multi-Location Support
features.description: Manage multiple outlets from a single, intuitive dashboard.

features.title: Business Profile Management
features.description: Easily update business details, contact info, and branding.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: Safe login with OTP verification and password protection for peace of mind.

features.title: Outlet Creation
features.description: Set up multiple locations with unique settings, hours, and capacity.

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Organize items into categories like Appetizers, Main Course, etc.

features.title: Recipe Management
features.description: Link menu items to ingredients for automatic, precise inventory tracking.

features.title: Real-time Stock Tracking
features.description: Monitor inventory levels for all ingredients and receive low-stock alerts.

features.title: Cost Analysis
features.description: Calculate the exact cost of producing each menu item for better pricing.

features.title: Role-Based Access
features.description: Assign different permissions for Managers, Staff, Kitchen, etc.

features.title: Staff Performance Tracking
features.description: Monitor staff activities, order processing times, and efficiency.

features.title: Table Status & Seating
features.description: Track table availability, occupancy, and manage assignments in real-time.

features.title: QR Code Generation
features.description: Create unique QR codes for each table. (Coming Soon)

features.title: Real-Time Orders
features.description: Receive instant notifications when customers place new orders.

features.title: Order Status Tracking
features.description: Monitor orders from pending to completed, including special instructions.

features.title: Sales Analytics
features.description: Track daily, weekly, and monthly sales performance to identify trends.

features.title: Business Intelligence
features.description: Optimize operations and track growth with key performance metrics.

restaurant.pageTitle: Restaurant Management System | Aap Ka Parcha RMS
restaurant.metaDescription: The ultimate Restaurant Management System (RMS) to streamline your operations. Manage tables, orders, kitchen, and inventory seamlessly with Aap Ka Parcha.

hero.subtitle: From fine dining to fast casual, our RMS provides the tools you need to increase table turnover, manage complex orders, and deliver an exceptional dining experience.

features.title: Features Designed for Restaurants
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run a successful and efficient restaurant.

features.title: Advanced Table Management
features.description: Visualize your floor plan, track table status in real-time, and manage reservations efficiently.

features.title: Kitchen Order Tickets (KOT)
features.description: Automate order printing directly to the kitchen for faster, error-free preparation.

features.title: Dynamic Menu Engineering
features.description: Easily create daily specials, happy hour menus, and update item availability on the fly.

features.title: Real-time Order Tracking
features.description: Monitor every order from the moment it's placed until it's served, ensuring quality and speed.

cafe.pageTitle: Cafe Management Software | Aap Ka Parcha RMS
cafe.metaDescription: Streamline your cafe with our all-in-one management software. Handle quick orders, manage inventory for coffee and pastries, and build customer loyalty.

hero.subtitle: Designed for the fast-paced cafe environment. Speed up your ordering process, manage inventory with ease, and keep your customers coming back for more.

features.title: Features Designed for Cafes
features.subtitle: Tools to help your cafe thrive in a competitive market.

features.title: Quick Service Orders
features.description: An interface optimized for speed to handle high-volume walk-in and takeaway orders.

features.title: Customer Loyalty Programs
features.description: Create and manage loyalty programs to reward your regulars and increase repeat business.

features.title: Ingredient-Level Inventory
features.description: Track coffee beans, milk, syrups, and pastries to get low-stock alerts and reduce waste.

features.title: Easy Payment Processing
features.description: Accept multiple payment methods including cards, UPI, and digital wallets for customer convenience.

bar.pageTitle: Bar Management & Inventory System | Aap Ka Parcha RMS
bar.metaDescription: The complete bar management system for inventory control, fast billing, and recipe management. Track every pour and maximize your bar's profitability.

hero.subtitle: Maximize profitability and efficiency with precise inventory tracking, fast billing, and powerful recipe management. Take complete control of your bar operations.

features.title: Features Designed for Bars & Pubs
features.subtitle: Tools to manage your inventory, staff, and sales with precision.

features.title: Beverage Inventory Control
features.description: Track liquor, beer, and wine down to the millilitre. Automate stock deduction with every order.

features.title: Cocktail Recipe Management
features.description: Define recipes for all your cocktails to ensure consistency and accurate inventory tracking.

features.title: Fast Billing & Split Payments
features.description: Generate bills quickly and easily split them among groups to keep customers happy.

features.title: Sales & Profit Analytics
features.description: Identify your most profitable drinks and peak hours to optimize your menu and staffing.

hotel.pageTitle: Hotel Restaurant Management | Aap Ka Parcha RMS
hotel.metaDescription: Integrate your hotel's restaurant, bar, and room service operations with a single, powerful RMS. Manage orders, billing, and inventory across all your F&B outlets.

hero.subtitle: Seamlessly manage your hotel's restaurant, in-room dining, and bar from a single platform. Consolidate orders, inventory, and billing for ultimate efficiency.

features.title: Features Designed for Hotels
features.subtitle: A unified solution for all your food and beverage outlets.

features.title: Multi-Outlet Management
features.description: Manage your restaurant, bar, cafe, and poolside service from one central dashboard.

features.title: In-Room Dining & Room Service

features.title: Centralized Guest Profiles
